description: Non-material amendment to planning application reference P2012/0660/FUL dated 15th February 2013. The amendment involves some changes to the size and number of rooflights on the top floor of the Drysdale Building.
decision_conditions:
To assist applicants in a positive manner, the Local Planning Authority has produced policies and written guidance, all of which is available on the Council's website. 

A pre-application advice service is also offered and encouraged.

Whilst no pre-application discussions were entered into, the policy advice and guidance available on the website was followed by the applicant.

The applicant therefore worked in a proactive manner taking into consideration the policies and guidance available to them, and therefore the LPA delivered a positive decision in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the NPPF.
